id: Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg are in crisis mode again following a New York Times expose
paragraph: Also: Zuckerberg gave Sandberg his personal vote of confidence following a damning New York Times story published Wednesday.One senator says the company "actually encouraged anti-Semitism" by hiring an opposition-research firm.General Counsel Colin Stretch said in July that he was leaving. Now he’s staying into 2019.The news leader published a damning story about the social media giant’s handling of recent scandals, so who gets the blame? If anyone.A Verge affiliate site
